import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add Mod Tags"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/mods/{mod-id}/tags"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add tags to a mod's profile. You can only add tags allowed by the parent game, which are listed in the `tag_option` column in the [Game's Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/game-object). Successful request will return [Message Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/message-object).



:::tip

Rules engine applies here

:::

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"mod-id","in":"path","description":"Mod id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"title":"Add Mod Tags Request","required":["tags"],"properties":{"tags":{"description":"Tags to apply to the mod. Every tag to apply requires a separate field with tags[] as the key (eg. tags[]=tag1, tags[]=tag2). Only the tags pre-defined by the parent game can be applied. To determine what tags are eligible, see the tags values within `tag_options` column on the parent [Game Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/game-object).","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":"easy"}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Created","headers":{"Location":{"description":"URL to newly created resource","schema":{"type":"string"}}},"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Message Object","properties":{"code":{"description":"[HTTP status code](/restapi/docs/response-codes) of response.","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":200},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"Your request was successful."}},"type":"object"}}}},"403":{"description":"The authenticated user does not have permission to submit tags for the specified mod. Ensure the user is part of the mod team before attempting the request again.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/docs/response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/docs/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"15037":"The authenticated user does not have permission to submit tags for the specified mod. Ensure the user is part of the mod team before attempting the request again."}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
